org.lwjgl.system.windows

Class DISPLAY_DEVICE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.windows.DISPLAY_DEVICE

  • public final class DISPLAY_DEVICE
extends java.lang.Object
    Receives information about the display device specified by the devNum parameter of the WinUser.EnumDisplayDevices(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int) function.
